items.name: app/api/auth
items.docs:
--- What's next? ---

  1. Rename `.env.example-auth` to `.env` and update the necessary environment variables.
  2. Execute `npm --env-file=.env drizzle-kit push` to create PostgreSQL tables.
  3. Start the development server with `npm run dev`.
  4. Access http://localhost:3000/auth/access/page to test the sign-in/sign-up functionality.
  5. Navigate to http://localhost:3000/auth/x/page to verify the protected route.
